author: "Dr Benjamin Moran"
date: "2023-06-13"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(brms)

# Import and Convert GRS into Ordered Data
vr <- readxl::read_excel("VR RCT.xlsx") |> 
  mutate_at(vars(c(Baseline_GRS_Average, Final_GRS_Average)), factor)

# Exploratory Data Analysis
# Baseline GRS Scores


mod1 <- brm(
  data = vr,
  formula = Final_GRS_Average ~ 1 + Baseline_GRS_Average + Group,
  family = cumulative("logit"),
  cores = parallel::detectCores(),
  backend = "cmdstanr"
)

summary(mod1)
pp_cprob <- pp_check(mod1, ndraws = 100)
plot(mod1)


```
